short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quiz yourself on content from any article on the internet, by using AI to generate questions with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Harken Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to facilitate learning from any article on the internet. By utilizing AI, it generates relevant questions with a single click, allowing you to assess your understanding as you read through the content.

The process is simple:

1. Open any online article.
2. Click on the Harken Chrome Extension to generate questions about the article.
3. Answer the questions as you progress through the article to reinforce your understanding.

You can easily add the most pertinent questions to your Harken account (harkenapp.com), which will allow you to efficiently review them on a spaced repetition schedule.
